title: Servers Down?
body: Just got disconnected from a game, reloaded client and says "League client update currently unavailable" for the new client and if you swap to legacy client has you update to prepare for new patch which still results in unavailable?

replies.body:
They are applying patch notes and ranked rewards(i think)

It happens every season the servers will be down for 3 hours(roughly)

also your game would of resulted in a draw and no stats were taken.
